damaged.description: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: Swooping low over the battlefield upon flame-wreathed wings, Heldrakes send their enemies diving for cover. Weaving and jinking like living beasts, they unleash torrents of fire from their blazing jaw-guns, tear enemy aircraft from the skies with their vicious talons, and honour Tzeentch with every sacrificial kill.

faction: Flame-wreathed: Each time this model ends a Normal move
you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. Until the end of the turn
models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.
